did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Cotton Fabrics First Year Lecture Notebook, 1905-1906
did.abstract: The Cotton Fabrics First Year Lecture Notebook was J. H. Hodgkinson's notebook from 1905-1906 for class at Manchester Municipal School of Technology.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Cotton Fabrics First Year Lecture Notebook must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Cotton Fabrics First Year Lecture Notebook, Ms2013-077, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Cotton Fabrics First Year Lecture Notebook was acquired by Special Collections prior to 2006.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Cotton Fabrics First Year Lecture Notebook was completed in September 2013.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Cotton Fabrics First Year Lecture Notebook was J.H. Hodgkinson's notebook from 1905-1906 for class at Manchester Municipal School of Technology. The notebook contains pages that on one side are labeled with Home Exercises or Lecture Notes and a space to put the date. The other side of each page is Hodgkinson's notes about cotton fabrics. There are also graph paper inserts that have cloth patterns drawn on them. Included in the book are also fabric samples.
